personal.name: Apranshu
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.bio: Passionate developer with 5+ years of experience building modern web applications. I love turning complex problems into simple, beautiful solutions.

about.description:
I'm a creative developer who believes in the power of clean code and beautiful design. With expertise in modern JavaScript frameworks and a keen eye for user experience, I build applications that not only work flawlessly but also delight users.

My journey in tech started when I built my first website at 15, and since then, I've been hooked on creating digital experiences that make a difference. I specialize in React, Node.js and Kotlin.

When I'm not coding, you'll find me sleeping and chilling while watching some good movie or web series or might be listening to some good music on my headphones.

projects.title: TaskNudge - To Do Application
projects.description: A production-ready Android application that helps users track daily tasks and sends smart reminders when tasks remain incomplete.

projects.title: Nexus AI
projects.description: Nexus AI is a web app where user use their google API key and get access of the AI based flowchart and self build flowchart.

experience.description: Leading development of enterprise applications, mentoring junior developers, and architecting scalable solutions.
achievements: Led team of 5 developers on major product launch
Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time by 60%

experience.description: Built and maintained multiple client-facing applications using React and Node.js ecosystem.
Created responsive and interactive web experiences for various clients across different industries.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Specialized in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.

education.institution: Kokilaben Dhirubhai Ambani Reliance Foundation School
